LanguageData.VAERoy_Crane.label: crane
LanguageData.VAERoy_Crane.description: A large, long legged bird species, cranes are a symbol of royalty and nobility and often populate royal gardens. It is believed that people of imperial rank will appreciate having plenty of cranes around them.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> If you have at least 5 cranes under your control, any pawn with a nobility rank of any kind receives a +5 mood boost.
LanguageData.VAERoy_Crane.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.VAERoy_Crane.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.VAERoy_Crane.tools.2.label: head
